titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 43: Judeo-Arabic translation of Genesis 8:11-9:26

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesStmt.note: A Judeo-Arabic translation, neither that of Saʹadia Gaon nor that of Japheth ben Ali; a Hebrew lead-word is provided at the beginning of each verse; Contains the translation of Genesis VIII 11 (חמאמה (היונה - IX 26 [כנ]ען ע[בד]; above most words are their equivalents in the original Hebrew, written in a small, cursive hand.
Condition: loss at middle, of 3-4 lines.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sephardic semi-square hand in black ink

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
